name: Teeter Game: Roll the Ball
description:
Teeter Balls is maze labyrinth game where you control steel ball by tilting the wooden labyrinth. Teeter is the classic Labyrinth Maze game, where you put the ball in the right hole, avoiding all the obstructions and holes. It is very cool addictive game for kids, adults and every one. This Teeter Balls game has amazing graphics with wooden texture.

75 levels absolutely for free and every labyrinth is different. Gameplay is challenging and you can try your best skills in this maze game. You can control the board by accelerometer.

There are also obstacles and you have to be careful with them
